name: Bathroom Break
description:
This game was made for Louisiana Tech's Game Design Class. The theme for this game was "Out of Order".

You play as a student on a generic campus. The bathroom is out of order so you must race across campus to reach the next nearest bathroom. Fight through the halls in this top down adventure game, knocking away all sorts of obstacles including chairs, desks, students, and even teachers. Can you reach the end before it is too late?

Programming: John Wolz

Artist: Misty Creamer
